author: swagata87
body:
Verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43025

Technical PR. No change in physics should be there; except: 
- some changes in Phase2 HLT, the cause of which is understood -> https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43025#issuecomment-1814590349 ). Moreover, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43171 is not backported to 13_3_X, that will also give rise to differences in phase2 HLT WFs. 
- some non-reproducibility issues https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43293

This PR allows HCal thresholds to be read from GT, so that during data-taking the thresholds can be updated more easily, w/o the overhead of needing a new CMSSW release every time there is a threshold update.

If this can enter 13_3_X then a proper validation with high-stat will be possible, which can be useful to gain more confidence before using it for 2024 data-taking.
title: [13_3_X] Adapt PF code to read Hcal thresholds from GT
